metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5812 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Inadequate security UI in iOS UI in Google Chrome prior to 74.0.3729.108allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via a crafted HTMLpage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
